Description:
Luxury urban living in Croydon Central.
Peacefully concealed behind a private fence, this newly constructed brick-veneer home is imbued with unhindered style and sophistication, poised on a meticulously landscaped block within an ultra-convenient Croydon Central location.
Designed to immerse the occupants in luxurious and spacious living, this stunning split-level residence displays the latest quality appointments and finishes, underpinned by a merging of neutral tones, black accents and solid wormy chestnut timber floors that radiate warmth and homeliness. Furthermore, the adoption of clean contemporary lines throughout develops an impression of class and distinction - one of many appreciable benefits that sets this home apart from the norm.
With a highest priority given to ensure the home excels in relaxation and entertaining, the masterfully conceived layout affords the occupants two spacious living areas. The formal lounge achieves the feeling of comfort and liveability while the open-plan family/meals offers a dynamic, welcoming domain for family and friends with ten-foot ceilings creating a sense of space and volume. From here, the room extends outdoors to a Merbau entertaining deck overlooking the fully landscaped backyard featuring a perfectly manicured Kings Pride Buffalo lawn and an established tree providing shade.
Sleek and sublime, every inch of the state-of-the-art kitchen has been well considered, showcasing premium Smeg appliances including a 900mm stainless steel electric oven and gas stove, in addition to an integrated dishwasher. With an obvious approach to ensuring streamlined practicality is paired with luxury, other highlights include; stone benchtops, marble-look stone backsplash, black tapware, pendant lighting, soft-close drawers and cupboards as well as stunning 2pac cabinetry. Lastly, tucked behind the kitchen is a semi butler's pantry offering a vast amount of storage, including a wine rack in addition to stone benchtops.
The master bedroom is generously sized and offers soul-soothing rejuvenation, beginning with a fitted walk-in robe leading into a full ensuite showcasing a frameless rain shower with double shower head, twin stone vanity, black square profile tapware, in-wall cistern, large mirror and large format floor-to-wall tiles. Three additional bedrooms are well proportioned, feature double built-in robes and share a bathroom echoing the same unrivalled modish beauty as the ensuite and incorporating a luxe walk-in rain shower, freestanding deep-soak bath, stylish stone vanity and separate toilet.
Boasting a six-star energy rating, the home immerses the occupants in a range of carefully curated inclusions, with highlights listing as; study, large tiled laundry with cupboard and bench space, Daikin inverter ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning (zoned), LED lights, double glazed windows in living areas, square set plastering, walk-in storage cupboard, double linen cupboard, solid timber stairs, quality plush carpet, privacy blinds, Colourbond roof, two water tanks totalling 5000 litres (connected to bathrooms), underfloor insulation, shed and remote-entry double garage with timber-look sectional tilt roller door as well as internal and rear access.
This property is set in an ultra-convenient location within walking distance to Croydon Central, Croydon Railway Station, Croydon Park with barbeque area and playground, Croydon Memorial Pool, bus stop, Hewish Road Child Care Centre, Ruskin Park and Croydon Primary Schools, Swinburne TAFE, as well as being just a brief drive from The Good Shepherd Primary School and EastLink freeway.
This bold and glamourous home offers the spoils of a relaxed, urban lifestyle.

Description:
A CLASS ABOVE
Wow, the original builder has transformed this neat three-bedroom two bathroom home into a modern home with all the bells and whistles. Highlighting new carpet to all the bedrooms and formal living area, and engaging engineering flooring that makes its own statement throughout much of the rest of the home. All windows have been dressed in quality blinds too.
Modernized bathrooms, laundry and the kitchen which flaunts Caesarstone stone bench tops and quality Westinghouse appliances have all been upgraded leaving little to do but to absorb these beautiful finishes in a home that is ideally designed to suit first home buyers right through to retirees and downsizers.
Not skimping on anything outside either, the gardens have been landscaped with new instant lawn features front and back, and with the addition of a Merbau deck to the side of the home, greater living and dining options are available during the warmer months.
Enhanced with evaporative cooling, ducted heating and a double garage with a rear roller door to access the back yard, the quiet location is extremely close to Croydon Main street shops and facilities, whilst benefiting from being a short commute to either Chirnside Park or Ringwood. Excellent schooling options are a few minutes up Maroondah Hwy and into the Croydon Hills vicinity, including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Good Shepherd Primary School.

Description:
Grand Design Family Residence!
Situated in the popular; The Range Estate, this innovative single level, near-new home situated on approximately 873m2 has an incredible bushland outlook while also enjoying breathtaking views to Mount Dandenong. This environmentally friendly and architecturally designed home has many modern and effective building elements and thermal efficiencies to save costs and enhance acoustic performance for a quiet, comfortable and peaceful home.
Upon entry into this charming family home, you are greeted by a beautiful porcelain-tiled hallway and grand 3m ceilings throughout. From the welcoming entrance, the large home office sits proudly with private entry to the carpeted fourth bedroom with built in cabinetry and second access to the rear hallway.
The elegant master suite features large WIR, separate sitting area or parents retreat and a spacious full ensuite complete with a large double-head shower, double vanity and separate WC. The other two good sized bedrooms with BIRs are serviced by the large third living area perfect for a childrens retreat, and the exquisite main bathroom with separate bath, shower and WC.
The formal sunken lounge in the centre of the home is perfect for entertaining guests or a peaceful reading retreat and features a stunning Quadra Fire Voyageur grand wood fire, perfect for curling up to in the winter months. The large open plan living/kitchen/dining area is great for socialising with families and friends and incorporates exciting elements for all members of the family, whilst the well-designed theatre room boasts Cat 6 wiring great for family movie time or a peaceful and private area away from the main zone of the house.
The central well-appointed kitchen with beautiful Caesarstone benches features island bench with 900mm gas cooktop, floating rangehood and under bench oven. With abundant storage throughout, dishwasher and separate butlers pantry with Blanco steam oven and second sink area, there is no shortage of space for entertaining and preparing meals.
Through double bi-fold doors, the lovely sandstone-paved alfresco area displays a stunning timber feature wall and another fantastic entertaining space for all times of the year. The split-level rear yard features a flat grassed area, well-established veggie gardens as well as extra space with potential for a childrens play area, garden shed or second outdoor living area.
With added conveniences such as evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, solar panels and solar hot water, there is many efficient components to this family property. Also with large separate laundry with rear access, double remote garage with 4m ceilings and ample storage space, only an inspection can truly uncover the sophisticated design of this home.
Located minutes from Croydon township, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, prestigious schools, parks and public transport, this stunning family home wont last long so dont delay, inspect today.
